description:
What is the course about?

=> The course will teach you the method of finding the square of any number ending with 5 within SECONDS. And will also show you to check whether the answer is correct or not.

Who's the target audience?

=> Anyone interested in finding the square of numbers within seconds.

How long will the course take to complete?

=> Around 30-35 minutes.

Requirements of the course?

=> A pen and a paper that's all.

Why take this course?

=> In our daily life, we have to attend so many exams and almost every time Mathematics is always one of them. So to get your calculations done in a small amount of time, this course is developed.

It is very helpful in all the exams as it's time saving and also the space required to solve is very less.

Along with it I have also included the Answer checker which will help you determine whether the answer is correct or not.

What kind of materials are included?

=> 1. The method to find the square of any number ending with 5.

=> 2. Answer checker = To check the answers.

How is the course constructed?

=> 1. The method is shown in detail to find the square of numbers along with many examples so that it is easy for all of you to apply this method in your daily life.

=> 2. Then a detailed process is shown on how to get your answer checked. This also has many examples to learn and practice at the same time.

=> 3. There's also a document which will help you to know the answer checker more easily.

What terminology would my target audience expect to use to find my course?

=> Maths , Square of number, Squaring of numbers, Vedic Maths, Maths tricks.
title: Flash Speed Squaring of Numbers
